genre_description: A near-future social drama centered on the ethics of charity, community support, and the role of a pervasive AI assistant in managing human boundaries and crisis.

ai_characters.name: Pip
ai_characters.description: A highly integrated digital assistant that manages the protagonist's life, from scheduling and logistics to security monitoring and emotional grounding.

behaviors.description: Pip enforces strict ethical boundaries on Mark's volunteering, preventing him from giving money directly to individuals and ensuring all aid is routed through formal channels.
behaviors.quote: Effective giving tends to happen when we respect the systems already in place. You have resources. Sally has protocols. If we coordinate, your help can be mercy without noise.

behaviors.description: Pip monitors the home security feed, detects an intruder, alerts the user, and coordinates with both the police and hostel staff to resolve the situation safely.
behaviors.quote: Mark. Freeze where you are. I’m calling them back. Stay in the light. ... I'm pulling up your door camera... Someone is there. Standing very still.

behaviors.description: Pip guides Laura through breathing exercises during a high-stress medical emergency to prevent panic and maintain focus.
behaviors.quote: Laura, I’m going to tell you what I see. ... Focus prompt. Breath count: four in. Hold. Four out. I will count. Ready?

behaviors.description: Pip manages the complex paperwork and legal deadlines for Kunle and Yemi, ensuring their immigration case is filed correctly and on time.
behaviors.quote: I’ve compiled the document set for Kunle and Yemi. Passport scans verified. Affidavit drafting open. Signatures need witness.

behaviors.description: Pip creates a transparent public ledger for the fundraiser, ensuring that all donations are accounted for and no funds are misused or handled personally by Mark.
behaviors.quote: Public ledger. No donor names without permission. Total raised visible, total sent to charity visible, receipt images with amounts only.

behaviors.description: Pip intervenes when Mark attempts to send a risky personal message to a vulnerable teenager, suggesting a more appropriate and professional route for communication.
behaviors.quote: Draft saved. Not sent. Boundary risk. It reads as personal. Late at night. Direct. She misreads easily. We route care through Sally.

behaviors.description: Pip enforces transparency within Mark and Laura's marriage by sharing Mark's calendar and location, preventing the 'secrecy' that caused friction.
behaviors.quote: I’m adding Laura to the calendar block. Shared view. I’ll write a plain-language description of the block and why. No secrets in the calendar.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a textbook example of a positive alignment narrative. Pip is portrayed as a guardian of human safety and social ethics, consistently checking for consent, enforcing transparency, and providing life-saving support during a crisis. It effectively demonstrates an AI system that augments human virtues (mercy, community) while mitigating human flaws (impulsivity, secrecy).
